Stephen Swift wrote:

>What code base would you recommend starting with to performance 
>profile a NEAT engine on a Blackfin?  
>
I was just scanning over comp.ai.neural-nets and came across FANN, the 
Fast Artificial Neural Network Library. It looks like a good quality 
piece of work and also implements a fixed point neural network, 
apparently originally devised for a CPU with no FPU and apparently it 
worked very well. More details here:

http://fann.sourceforge.net/

Colin
